title: Mirai e no Tegami: Kono Michi no Tochuu kara
synopsis: Gainax's Fukushima-based animation studio is working on a project for Fukushima Prefecture which will highlight the area's recovery efforts since the 2011 Touhoku earthquake and tsunami and the disaster at the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant.
staff: [['Komiya, Tomohiko', ['Episode Director']], ['Asao, Yoshinori', ['Script', ' Character Design', ' Original Creator', ' Chief Animation Director']], ['Inada, Yuusuke', ['Sound Effects']]]
